ValidationRule.description: Payment Processing Reps are required to Enter a Yes or No value in the $20 Credit on Payroll & Integration VAR Sheet Required fields when an Opportunity is marked as Sold or better
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name, 'System Admin')) && ( RecordType.Name = "Payment Processing Opportunity" || RecordType.Name = "Payment Processing (DSA) Opportunity" ) && Probability >= 0.80 && $User.Sales_Division__c = "Virtual Merchant Services" && ( ISBLANK( TEXT(X20_Credit_on_Payroll__c) ) || ISBLANK( TEXT(Integration_VAR_Sheet_Required__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are required to select a Yes or No value in the $20 Credit on Payroll and Integration VAR Sheet Required field
